---
output:
  html_document:
    theme:  paper
    highlight: textmate
    includes:
      in_header: "bootstrap.html"
      after_body: "boostrapJS.html"
---
<div class="form-group">
<label for="formGroupExampleInput">姓名</label>
<input type="text" class="form-control" id="formGroupExampleInput">
</div>
<form>
<div class="form-group">
<label for="exampleFormControlInput1">電子信箱</label>
<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlInput1" placeholder="name@example.com">
</div>
<div class="form-group">
<label for="formGroupExampleInput">電話</label>
<input type="number" class="form-control" id="formGroupExampleInput">
</div>
<div class="form-group row">
<label for="example-date-input" class="col-2 col-form-label">生日</label>
<div class="col-10">
<input class="form-control" type="date" value="2000-08-19" id="example-date-input">
</div>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
<label for="exampleFormControlSelect1">性別</label>
<select class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlSelect1">
<option>生理男性</option>
<option>生理女性</option>
</select>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
<label for="formGroupExampleInput">學校</label>
<input type="text" class="form-control" id="formGroupExampleInput" placeholder="芋仔高中">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
<label for="exampleFormControlSelect1">年級</label>
<select class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlSelect1">
<option>1</option>
<option>2</option>
<option>3</option>
<option>其他</option>
</select>
</div>
</div>
<br>
<center>
<a href="questionnaire.html">
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-success">submit</button></a>
</a>
</center>
</form>
